requirement_tested: A practice question bank feature allowing users to browse and select individual questions
user_persona: A new driver preparing for their license exam who wants to focus on specific topics.
user_goal: To browse and select a practice question from the 'Traffic Signs' topic.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Practice Questions
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the DMV practice test website and sees a list of topics. She wants to study traffic signs specifically.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Select Topic' dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dropdown menu expands, showing available topics including 'Traffic Signs'.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering by Topic
narrative_steps.description: Sarah selects 'Traffic Signs' from the dropdown to filter the questions.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Traffic Signs' from the dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The question cards update to show only those related to Traffic Signs.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing a Question
narrative_steps.description: Sarah clicks on one of the filtered question cards to begin practicing.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a question card under the 'Traffic Signs' category.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system navigates to the detailed view of the selected question.

requirement_tested: Simulated exam functionality enabling users to take full practice tests
user_persona: A learner who feels ready to simulate the actual driving exam experience.
user_goal: To start and complete a timed simulated exam.

narrative_steps.title: Starting the Exam
narrative_steps.description: Alex clicks the 'Start Exam' button to begin a full-length practice test.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Start Exam' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The timer starts counting down from 45 minutes, and the first question is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Answering Questions
narrative_steps.description: Alex reads each question carefully and selects an answer before moving forward.
narrative_steps.action: Select an answer option and click 'Next Question'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The next question loads, and progress is tracked internally.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Exam
narrative_steps.description: After answering all questions, Alex submits the exam to see results.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit Exam' button at the end of the test.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The exam is submitted via API, scored, and redirected to the results page.

requirement_tested: Error analysis dashboard displaying detailed feedback on incorrect answers
user_persona: A student reviewing mistakes made during a recent practice exam.
user_goal: To understand why they answered certain questions incorrectly.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Error Analysis
narrative_steps.description: Jordan finishes an exam and chooses to review incorrect answers.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Review Answers' link on the results page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the error analysis dashboard showing incorrectly answered questions.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Explanation
narrative_steps.description: Jordan clicks on an incorrect question to read the explanation.
narrative_steps.action: Click on an expandable row representing an incorrect answer.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The row expands to reveal a detailed explanation about the correct reasoning.

requirement_tested: Exam scoring system showing results and performance metrics after each test
user_persona: A candidate eager to know how well they performed on their latest practice test.
user_goal: To view their score and determine if they passed the simulated exam.

narrative_steps.title: Exam Completion
narrative_steps.description: Taylor completes a full practice exam and waits for the results.
narrative_steps.action: Submit the exam by clicking the 'Submit Exam' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to a results screen displaying score and pass/fail status.

narrative_steps.title: Analyzing Results
narrative_steps.description: Taylor checks the score displayed in percentage format along with other metrics.
narrative_steps.action: Read the score shown in the format '{score}% ({correct}/{total})'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The score is clearly visible with a green checkmark indicating a pass or red X for fail.

requirement_tested: User interface with floral white background and dark goldenrod colored components
user_persona: A visually-oriented user who appreciates consistent and accessible design.
user_goal: To navigate the site comfortably with a pleasant and uniform visual theme.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Site Theme
narrative_steps.description: Maya visits the homepage and notices the consistent color scheme throughout.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the overall appearance of the page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Background is floral white (#FFFAF0), and all components like buttons and headers are styled in dark goldenrod (#B8860B).

requirement_tested: Frontend application that fetches all practice questions and exam data from backend APIs
user_persona: A user expecting up-to-date content without any preloaded fake data.
user_goal: To interact with dynamically loaded questions and exam data.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Practice Questions
narrative_steps.description: Riley lands on the main page and expects to see real questions fetched from the server.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the homepage which mounts the question list component.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Questions load dynamically from the GET /api/questions endpoint and render correctly.

requirement_tested: Backend server connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer verifying backend connectivity to the database.
user_goal: To ensure the backend securely connects to PostgreSQL using environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Connection
narrative_steps.description: Dev starts the backend server and confirms it connects to the PostgreSQL instance.
narrative_steps.action: Check logs after starting the backend service.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Logs indicate successful connection using DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.

requirement_tested: Database schema supporting storage of questions, user responses, and exam results
user_persona: A database administrator validating table structures.
user_goal: To confirm proper relational schema exists for storing exam-related data.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Tables
narrative_steps.description: DBA reviews the database to verify creation of required tables.
narrative_steps.action: Query the database to inspect existing tables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tables named 'users', 'questions', 'responses', and 'exams' exist with appropriate fields and relationships.

requirement_tested: Question selection interface allowing users to choose topics or randomize practice questions
user_persona: A user wanting variety in their practice routine.
user_goal: To get a randomized set of practice questions across different topics.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Random Option
narrative_steps.description: Casey wants mixed-topic practice and chooses the random option.
narrative_steps.action: Open the topic selector dropdown and choose 'Random'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Question list shuffles and presents a mix of questions from all topics.

requirement_tested: Timer functionality for simulated exams to mimic real testing conditions
user_persona: An anxious test-taker trying to manage time effectively.
user_goal: To practice managing time under exam-like constraints.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Time
narrative_steps.description: Jamie begins the exam and keeps an eye on the countdown timer.
narrative_steps.action: Start the exam and observe the timer in the top right corner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Timer counts down from 45 minutes, updating every second visibly.

narrative_steps.title: Time Runs Out
narrative_steps.description: Jamie doesn't finish in time and the timer expires.
narrative_steps.action: Wait until the timer reaches zero.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Exam auto-submits and redirects to the results page.

requirement_tested: Score history tracking to allow users to review past exam performances
user_persona: A diligent student monitoring improvement over time.
user_goal: To review past exam scores and durations.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting History Section
narrative_steps.description: Pat navigates to the history tab to check previous attempts.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'My Exam History' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: List of past exams appears with dates, scores, and durations.

narrative_steps.title: Drilling Into Past Performance
narrative_steps.description: Pat clicks on a past exam to revisit its results.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific exam entry from the history list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to that examâ€™s detailed results and error analysis.

requirement_tested: Answer explanation display for both correct and incorrect responses
user_persona: A curious learner who always wants to understand the reasoning behind answers.
user_goal: To learn from both correct and incorrect selections.

narrative_steps.title: Seeing Immediate Feedback
narrative_steps.description: Sam submits an answer and immediately gets feedback.
narrative_steps.action: Select an answer and submit it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Explanation appears below the question detailing why the choice was right or wrong.

requirement_tested: Responsive design ensuring usability across desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: A commuter studying on-the-go using a smartphone.
user_goal: To seamlessly use the platform regardless of device type.

narrative_steps.title: Using Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: Lee accesses the site on a phone while commuting.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window to simulate mobile screen size or open on mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts responsively with larger touch targets and readable fonts.

requirement_tested: User session management to track progress and maintain state during exams
user_persona: A busy parent multitasking while taking a practice exam.
user_goal: To resume an exam after accidentally closing the browser.

narrative_steps.title: Accidentally Closing Browser
narrative_steps.description: Morgan closes the browser mid-exam but quickly reopens it.
narrative_steps.action: Close and reopen the browser tab during an ongoing exam.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System restores the exam state from sessionStorage, preserving answers and current position.

requirement_tested: Package.json configuration enabling concurrent frontend and backend development startup
user_persona: A developer setting up the project locally for development.
user_goal: To easily run both frontend and backend services simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Running Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Dev wants to launch both parts of the application quickly.
narrative_steps.action: Execute command `npm run dev` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend servers start concurrently, ready for development.
